thread.section_title: Remitly | Send Money Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Remitly | Send Money Home | remitly.com
thread.title: Krishnakumar Joshi
thread.title_full: Remitly | Send Money Home reviewed by Krishnakumar Joshi

author: Krishnakumar Joshi
title: Krishnakumar Joshi
text:
I would never recommend anyone. Zero value for your money and time.
No I wouldn't use your service nor would every refer anyone, you simply don't keep promises. I was given so many false promises regarding the transfer, I would have appreciated if I were given a right information. Even though the processing was delayed I would have been happy to have realistic and honest response. However, 7 times from 7 different people I was given false statements and different delivery dates! Which in itself shows the flaw and dishonesty to client's time, and shows zero respect to client's trust.
